Summary: White/silver disc "parked" in sky ENE of Sun City West
divs: sighting detailsdriving ne out of grocery store parking lot mid-afternoon, i spotted in the sky ahead, a white\silver disc against the bottom of a cloud. it was obviously not a natural part of the sky; it was something manufactured, made, and don't know why, but i assumed it was metal or ceramic. it was a perfect round, seemingly-flat disc, face-on, silvery-white, a bit whiter than the moving clouds behind it. it didn't seem to reflect light. it didn't move. its very stillness was part of what made it noticeable. one of my first fleeting thoughts was that it looked like a coin blank. most first thought fragments had to do with what it was doing there. i had the feeling it was watching. as i drove, i tried to watch it and at the same time find a place i could stop safely to watch it. it never moved. i finally turned off on a side street in order to park, -- but it was gone. i didn't see it move or disappear, nor was i able to find it anywhere else in the sky. ever since, i scan the sky all the time. my son in mn says he has seen such discs over minneapolis.
trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were no other sightings in Phoenix on or around August 15th 2007
